Package ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.project

Class CopiesList

java.lang.Object
ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.project.CopiesList
public class CopiesList extends Object
A file that contains the desired number of copies of different components in a deck task. Can be queried with a file name to retrieve the number of copies of that item to include.
Since:
3.0

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CopiesList()
    Creates an empty list that returns 1 copy for all cards.
    CopiesList​(Task taskFolder)
    Creates a copies list using the standard copies list file for a task folder.
    CopiesList​(File copiesListFile)
    Creates a copies list using the entries stored in an arbitrary file.

  • Constructor Details

    • CopiesList

      public CopiesList()
      Creates an empty list that returns 1 copy for all cards. This list cannot be stored.

    • CopiesList

      public CopiesList​(Task taskFolder) throws IOException
      Creates a copies list using the standard copies list file for a task folder.
      Parameters:
      taskFolder - the folder to fetch the copies list from
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • CopiesList

      public CopiesList​(File copiesListFile) throws IOException
      Creates a copies list using the entries stored in an arbitrary file.
      Parameters:
      copiesListFile - the file containing the copy information
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

  • Method Details

    • getCopyCount

      public int getCopyCount​(File file)
      Return the number of copies for a file with the same file name as the specified file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to determine the copy count of
      Returns:
      the number of copies of the file to include

    • getCopyCount

      public int getCopyCount​(String name)
      Returns the number of copies for a file with the specified name. If the name ends with the suffix ".eon", and the copies list does not contain a matching entry but does contain an entry for the same file name without a suffix, then the ".eon" suffix will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      name - the file name to fetch a copy count for
      Returns:
      the number of copies of the file to include

    • setCopyCount

      public void setCopyCount​(File file, int copies)
      Sets the number of copies to include for a file with the same name as the specified file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to modify the copy count for
      copies - the new copy count
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the file is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of copies is negative

    • setCopyCount

      public void setCopyCount​(String name, int copies)
      Sets the number of copies to include for a file with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the file name to modify the copy count for
      copies - the new copy count
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the name is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of copies is negative

    • getListEntries

      public String[] getListEntries()
      Returns the name part of each entry explicitly included in the copies list.
      Returns:
      the file names included in the copies list

    • store

      public void store() throws IOException
      Write the copies data to the file used to construct this list.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the list was not created from a file
